videos.description: Myles Turner comes up with a big block on LaMelo Ball early in the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Turner stuffs LaMelo at the rim) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Turner stuffs LaMelo at the rim

videos.description: LaMelo Ball comes up with the steal and flushes home the uncontested dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo Ball steals it in the open court and stuffs it home) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo Ball steals it in the open court and stuffs it home

videos.description: LaMelo Ball is carrying the Hornets' offense with his third 3-pointer of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo hits his third 3 of the game) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo hits his third 3 of the game

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis dominates the Hornets in the first half, scoring 22 points and adding 8 rebounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sabonis scores 22 in the first half) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis scores 22 in the first half

videos.description: Lamelo Ball shows off the range on 3-point shot

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lamelo Ball shows off the range on 3-point shot) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lamelo Ball shows off the range on 3-point shot

videos.description: LaMelo Ball runs the pick and roll to perfection with Mason Plumlee.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo finds Plumlee for the alley-oop) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo finds Plumlee for the alley-oop

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis is on fire vs. the Hornets, knocking down another 3 to get the game to single digits.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sabonis hits another 3 to cut into Hornets lead) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis hits another 3 to cut into Hornets lead

videos.description: LaMelo ball is keeping the Pacers out of reach with his outside shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo nails his seventh 3-pointer of the game) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo nails his seventh 3-pointer of the game

videos.description: Gordon Hayward collects a pass from LaMelo Ball and banks in a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Hayward banks in a 3
